Methods

Process

Process the current message

procedure Process(DebugMode: Boolean)

Parameters

Name Type Description
DebugMode Boolean

If enabled, error messages will be reported to the user

GetAttachmentAsStream

Returns the message's attachments as InStream. Used to process the message contents for incoming messages

procedure GetAttachmentAsStream(var TempBlob: Codeunit "Temp Blob", var InStream: InStream): Boolean

Parameters

Name Type Description
TempBlob "Temp Blob"

The TempBlob instance containing the streams
InStream InStream

The InStream to read the message contents

Returns

Type Description
Boolean

True if the attachment was successfully retrieved

AddMessageLink

Adds a link to a source record

procedure AddMessageLink(Source: Variant, DocumentNo: Code[20])

Parameters

Name Type Description
Source Variant

The source (record) to link the message to
DocumentNo Code[20]

The document number of the source (record) to link the message to

AddMessageLink

Adds a link to a source record

procedure AddMessageLink(Source: Variant, DocumentNo: Code[20], NewOperation: Enum "ESCA Operation")

Parameters

Name Type Description
Source Variant

The source (record) to link the message to
DocumentNo Code[20]

The document number of the source (record) to link the message to
NewOperation "ESCA Operation"

The operation performed on the source (record)

AddAdditionalFields

Adds a set of additional (custom) fields to an outgoing message. Fields are defined in the 'Message Type Field' table

procedure AddAdditionalFields(var XmlNode: XmlNode, Source: Variant)

Parameters

Name Type Description
XmlNode XmlNode

The XmlNode to add the fields to
Source Variant

The source (record) to get the data from

ProcessAdditionalFields

Process a set of additional (custom) fields on an incoming message. Fields are defined in the 'Message Type Field' table

procedure ProcessAdditionalFields(var XmlNode: XmlNode, var Source: Variant)

Parameters

Name Type Description
XmlNode XmlNode

The XmlNode to read the fields from
Source Variant

The source (record) to write the data to

GetAPIResponseFromAttachment

Returns the message api's response as parsed from the message's attachments. Used when the message request api is implemented.

procedure GetAPIResponseFromAttachment(TempBlob: Codeunit "Temp Blob", var InStr: InStream): Boolean

Parameters

Name Type Description
TempBlob "Temp Blob"

The TempBlob instance containing the message api's response
InStr InStream

The instream to read the message api's response

Returns

Type Description
Boolean

True if the api response was successfully retrieved
